title: r/Choosingbeggars This Lady Tried to Refund a X-mas Tree... IN JANUARY!
description:
r/Choosingbeggars Are you ready for some of the cheapest and most manipulative people on planet Earth? This lady actually dragged a Christmas tree back to Target with the expectation that they were going to refund her in JANUARY! Lady, who on Earth is going to buy a dead Christmas tree when Christmas is already over? Did you really think that was going to work? If you like this podcast, follow for more daily Reddit content!
